lines.text: Streaming summaries for long PDFs

spans.text: Streaming summaries for long PDFs

lines.text: When you use Generative summary to scan lengthy PDFs, Acrobat or Acrobat Reader

spans.text: When you use Generative summary to scan lengthy PDFs, Acrobat or Acrobat Reader

lines.text: processes the content in chunks and simultaneously streams summaries of the portions that it

spans.text: processes the content in chunks and simultaneously streams summaries of the portions that it

lines.text: processes. It helps improve your productivity because you can instantly review the output and

spans.text: processes. It helps improve your productivity because you can instantly review the output and

lines.text: stay engaged.

spans.text: stay engaged.

lines.text: The key advantages of streaming summaries include:

spans.text: The key advantages of streaming summaries include:

lines.text: Real-time streaming : As Acrobat or Acrobat Reader processes a lengthy PDF, it

spans.text: Real-time streaming
: As Acrobat or Acrobat Reader processes a lengthy PDF, it

lines.text: concurrently streams summaries for sections it has already analyzed. It helps eliminate

spans.text: concurrently streams summaries for sections it has already analyzed. It helps eliminate

lines.text: any latency associated with summarizing voluminous content.

spans.text: any latency associated with summarizing voluminous content.

lines.text: Segmented display : When you start generating the summary for your content, you'll

spans.text: Segmented display
: When you start generating the summary for your content, you'll

lines.text: immediately see summarized content for the sections that the Generative summary

spans.text: immediately see summarized content for the sections that the Generative summary

lines.text: feature finished processing.

spans.text: feature finished processing.

lines.text: Parallel processing : While you engage with the summarized sections, the feature

spans.text: Parallel processing
: While you engage with the summarized sections, the feature

lines.text: extracts headings, and generates summaries for the subsequent sections.

spans.text: extracts headings, and generates summaries for the subsequent sections.
